{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Billion |model=BiPAC 8700AX-1600 |fcc_date=04/09/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=QI3BIL-8700AXL |us_id=B12DL01ABEC8700AXL |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63167;BCM63167VKREBG, TN1647 P40, H58-25 P3A W; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |ram1_brand=Winbond |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63167;BCM63167VKREBG, TN1647 P40, H58-25 P3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TE1727 P11, 238-16 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S;BCM53124SKMMLG, TE1649 P30, 560-14 3B W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+, TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:23:B8 |oui_eth=0C:49:33 }}
:• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Triple-WAN Wireless 1600 Mbps VPN VDSL2/ADSL2+ Firewall Router}} "GJ27.820.11005V??" and "BCM63167" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. "Triple-WAN" apparently refers to: # VDSL2 interface # ADSL2+ interface # 1x 10/100/1000 Ethernet WAN A [https://fccid.io/QI3BIL-8700AXL/Letter/Product-Similarity-Declaration-3810615 '''Product Similarity Declaration''' on the FCC] suggests that this product may go by other names: * [[Billion BiPAC 8700AXL-1600]] - VPN support not available in software * [[BEC BEC 8700AXL]] - VPN support not available in software
